attributes.action: Reform the House of Commons and give us None of the Above on all ballot sheets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is clear now that we have a government who work for their own ends and careers instead of our own.
They can no longer be termed as civil servants and should be referred to as civil masters. 
Our democratic rights are flawed in that 
we only get to vote for the choices made by the parties.
We need a "None of the Above" option on ballot sheets at all elections, whether for councils or parliament. 
We need this now before the next election.

This would give us ordinary people a say, and would show publicly the level of distrust and disatisfaction across all parties this action alone could trigger this reform that is now clearly needed.

When "None Of the Above" wins an area all political parties should then present a new candidate for the revote, for the sake of government the original MP can temporarily retain their seat but is not allowed to be included in the next revote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
